1.0.name: wordpress/map-categories-to-attachment
1.0.description:
A wordpress plugin that allows you to add categories to attachments. Similar to http://wordpress.org/plugins/map-categories-to-pages/, but just allows you to set the attachment's category.

Map Categories to Attachment displays the category box on the "Edit Attachment" page. By default, Every attachment in wordpress is mapped to the default category but this plugin gives the option to select categories for an attachment.
